synopsis.text: Boyish charm and unrequited love take center stage in this high school anime, as we follow the adventures of Tomo Aizawa and her lifelong friend, Junichiro Kubota. Despite their years of camaraderie and shared experiences, Tomo finds herself longing for Jun to see her as more than just a buddy. Yet, her tomboyish demeanor and penchant for punching over professing love leave Jun oblivious to her romantic intentions. As they navigate their first year of high school, Tomo embarks on a mission to shed her boyish image and reveal her true feelings to Jun. Will Tomo's efforts be enough to make Jun see her in a new light, or will their friendship remain firmly entrenched in the friend zone? Join Tomo on her quest for love and self-discovery in this heartwarming and hilarious tale of adolescence.
